Messages.Content: Hello, tomorrow 30.04 our seminar will exceptionally take place in another room. Please come to my room in ISR, B219 at 16.00 and we will go reach our room together. P.s.: in case you are not attending this seminar anymore, please unsubsribe from the ISIS course. Regards
